greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of connected components remaining when decimal expansion of the number n is cut from a piece of paper.
comment: Assumes that 4 is represented without a hole.
mathematica: a[n_ /; 0 <= n <= 9] := a[n] = {2, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 1, 3, 2}[[n + 1]]; a[n_] := Total[a /@ (id = IntegerDigits[n])] - Length[id] + 1 ; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 104}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 22 2013 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 07 2001
